item.title: Proxmox Expand HD Space
item.description: Expand HD space in Proxmox VM lsblk sudo fdisk -l /dev/sda sudo parted /dev/sda - print - F (fix) - resizepart 3 100% - quit sudo fdisk -l /dev/sda sudo pvresize /dev/sda3 sudo lvextend ubuntu-vg/ubuntu-lv -l+100%FREE sudo resize2fs /dev/ubuntu-vg/ubuntu-lv sudo reboot
